title: Nerawareta Gakuen
alternative_title: Psychic School Wars, ねらわれた学園
description: Spring marks the start of another new school year at a junior high school in Kamakura. A new transfer student, Kyougoku Ryouichi joins the 8th grade. He has a very special proficiency in telepathy and has been ordered by his father to use this ability to scan other people's minds and take over the school.He instantly gains popularity at school from his good looks and charisma and he sets about taking control of the school. As people begin to fall under Ryouichi's spell, he covertly manipulates his followers and pushes aside anyone who gets in his way.With the school almost completely under the control of Ryouichi, only one boy seems unaffected - Seki Kenji. Does Kenji have what it takes to save everyone from the clutches of mind control?
